header_text: At a dinner party, your friend tells a funny joke. You laugh so much that it feels like you can't get enough air. This experience is enjoyable.

elements.Text: Is it fun to laugh really hard?

elements.name: At a dinner party, your friend tells a funny joke. You laugh so much that it feels like you can't get enough air. This experience is enjoyable. _Social Situations_comp_question
